Hero.title: Hello, I am
Hero.name: Erickson Da Veiga
Hero.subtitle: Software Engineer
Hero.description: A developer passionate about technology, always looking to innovate and create efficient solutions. I love transforming ideas into digital products that make a difference.

About.title: About Me
About.description: I am a professional passionate about technology, specialized in web application development and system management. With solid hands-on experience acquired through real projects, I have participated in creating technological solutions for various companies and institutions, always focused on efficiency and innovation. My skills encompass full-stack development, database management, and front-end and back-end frameworks. I have a practical and results-oriented approach, always seeking new ways to optimize processes and provide creative solutions to technological challenges. Fluent in Portuguese and French, I am prepared to work in international and diverse environments, contributing significantly to the growth and success of the projects I am involved in.

Nhabex.title: Nhabex
Nhabex.description: Queue management system for public and private institutions.

Sport_Hall.title: Sport Hall
Sport_Hall.description: Management platform for gyms and sports facilities.

Foo.title: Say Hello
Foo.description: Interested in working together? Let's schedule a time to chat. The coffee is on me.
